verses.text: My \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, if thou be \w surety|strong="H6148"\w* for thy \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, \add if\add* thou hast \w stricken|strong="H8628"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* with a \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w*,

Thou art \w snared|strong="H3369"\w* with the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, thou art \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* with the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* this \w now|strong="H0645"\w*, my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thyself, when thou art \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* of thy \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*; \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w humble|strong="H7511"\w* thyself, and make \w sure|strong="H7292"\w* thy \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*.\f + \fr 6.3 \ft and make…: or, so shalt thou prevail with thy friend\f*
\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* not \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* to thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, nor \w slumber|strong="H8572"\w* to thine \w eyelids|strong="H6079"\w*.

\w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thyself as a \w roe|strong="H6643"\w* from the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add of the hunter\add*, and as a \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* from the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w fowler|strong="H3353"\w*.
¶ \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* to the \w ant|strong="H5244"\w*, thou \w sluggard|strong="H6102"\w*; \w consider|strong="H7200"\w* her \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and be \w wise|strong="H2449"\w*:
Which having no \w guide|strong="H7101"\w*, \w overseer|strong="H7860"\w*, or \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w*,

\w Provideth|strong="H3559"\w* her \w meat|strong="H3899"\w* in the \w summer|strong="H7019"\w*, \add and\add* \w gathereth|strong="H0103"\w* her \w food|strong="H3978"\w* in the \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*.
How long wilt thou \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w*, O \w sluggard|strong="H6102"\w*? when wilt thou \w arise|strong="H6965"\w* out of thy \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*?

\add Yet\add* a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*, a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w slumber|strong="H8572"\w*, a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w folding|strong="H2264"\w* of the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* to \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w*:

So shall thy \w poverty|strong="H7389"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* as one that \w travelleth|strong="H1980"\w*, and thy \w want|strong="H4270"\w* as an \w armed|strong="H4043"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.

¶ A \w naughty|strong="H1100"\w* \w person|strong="H0120"\w*, a \w wicked|strong="H0205"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* with a \w froward|strong="H6143"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

He \w winketh|strong="H7169"\w* with his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, he \w speaketh|strong="H4448"\w* with his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, he \w teacheth|strong="H3384"\w* with his \w fingers|strong="H0676"\w*;

\w Frowardness|strong="H8419"\w* \add is\add* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, he \w deviseth|strong="H2790"\w* \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w* \w continually|strong="H6256"\w*; he \w soweth|strong="H7971"\w* \w discord|strong="H4066"\w*.\f + \fr 6.14 \ft soweth: Heb. casteth forth\f*

Therefore shall his \w calamity|strong="H0343"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w*; \w suddenly|strong="H6621"\w* shall he be \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* without \w remedy|strong="H4832"\w*.

¶ These \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \add things\add* doth the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w*: yea, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \add are\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* unto \w him|strong="H5315"\w*:\f + \fr 6.16 \ft unto…: Heb. of his soul\f*

A \w proud|strong="H7311"\w* \w look|strong="H5869"\w*, a \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*, and \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* that \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*,\f + \fr 6.17 \ft A proud…: Heb. Haughty eyes\f*

An \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* that \w deviseth|strong="H2790"\w* \w wicked|strong="H0205"\w* \w imaginations|strong="H4284"\w*, \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* that be \w swift|strong="H4116"\w* in \w running|strong="H7323"\w* to \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w*,

A \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \add that\add* \w speaketh|strong="H6315"\w* \w lies|strong="H3577"\w*, and he that \w soweth|strong="H7971"\w* \w discord|strong="H4090"\w* among \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.

¶ My \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w*, and \w forsake|strong="H5203"\w* not the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*:
\w Bind|strong="H7194"\w* them \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* upon thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \add and\add* \w tie|strong="H6029"\w* them about thy \w neck|strong="H1621"\w*.

When thou \w goest|strong="H1980"\w*, it shall \w lead|strong="H5148"\w* thee; when thou \w sleepest|strong="H7901"\w*, it shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thee; and \add when\add* thou \w awakest|strong="H6974"\w*, it shall \w talk|strong="H7878"\w* with thee.

For the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* \add is\add* a \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w*; and the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \add is\add* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*; and \w reproofs|strong="H8433"\w* of \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w* \add are\add* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w*:\f + \fr 6.23 \ft lamp: or, candle\f*

To \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thee from the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, from the \w flattery|strong="H2513"\w* of the \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* of a strange \w woman|strong="H5237"\w*.\f + \fr 6.24 \ft of the…: or, of the strange tongue\f*
\w Lust|strong="H2530"\w* not after her \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w* in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*; neither let her \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thee with her \w eyelids|strong="H6079"\w*.

For by means \w of|strong="H1157"\w* a \w whorish|strong="H2181"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \add a man is brought\add* to a \w piece|strong="H3603"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*: and the \w adulteress|strong="H0802"\w* will \w hunt|strong="H6679"\w* for the \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.\f + \fr 6.26 \ft the adulteress: Heb. the woman of a man, or, a man’s wife\f*
Can a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w take|strong="H2846"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in his \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*, and his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w* not be \w burned|strong="H8313"\w*?
Can \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* upon hot \w coals|strong="H1513"\w*, and his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* not be \w burned|strong="H3554"\w*?
So he that goeth \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to his \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*; whosoever \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* her shall not be \w innocent|strong="H5352"\w*.

\add Men\add* do not \w despise|strong="H0936"\w* a \w thief|strong="H1590"\w*, if he \w steal|strong="H1589"\w* to \w satisfy|strong="H4390"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* when he is \w hungry|strong="H7456"\w*;

But \add if\add* he be \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, he shall \w restore|strong="H7999"\w* \w sevenfold|strong="H7659"\w*; he shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* all the \w substance|strong="H1952"\w* of his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\add But\add* whoso committeth \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w* with a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w lacketh|strong="H2638"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*: he \add that\add* \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* it \w destroyeth|strong="H7843"\w* his own \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.\f + \fr 6.32 \ft understanding: Heb. heart\f*
A \w wound|strong="H5061"\w* and \w dishonour|strong="H7036"\w* shall he \w get|strong="H4672"\w*; and his \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* shall not be wiped \w away|strong="H4229"\w*.

For \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* \add is\add* the \w rage|strong="H2534"\w* of a \w man|strong="H1397"\w*: therefore he will not \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w*.

He will not \w regard|strong="H5375"\w* any \w ransom|strong="H3724"\w*; neither will he rest \w content|strong="H0014"\w*, though thou givest \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w gifts|strong="H7810"\w*.\f + \fr 6.35 \ft He will…: Heb. He will not accept the face of any ransom\f*
